dict.acceptation: 必要地；必需地；必定地；必然地；

sent.orig: Are there any things that necessarily exist (or necessarily don't exist)?
sent.trans: 我们说——什么东西——存在——是什么意思？

sent.orig: Money, therefore, necessarily after goods, but goods do not always or necessarily after money.
sent.trans: 所以，货币必然追求货物，而货物却并不总是追求货币甚至没有这个必要。

sent.orig: Success not necessarily true success and failures are not necessarily really failed!
sent.trans: 失败了不要怕，我们永远支持你，一定要挺住，相信你是最棒的！

sent.orig: Discrete data is not necessarily homogeneous, and discrete selection is not necessarily contiguous.
sent.trans: 离散数据不一定是同一类的，离散选择也不一定是连续的。

sent.orig: Possessing much won't necessarily make one satisfied; possessing little won't necessarily make one want.
sent.trans: 拥有的多，不一定让人满足；拥有的少，不一定让人贫乏。
